verses.roman:
ei caudda śloke kari maṅgalācaraṇa
taṅhi madhye kahi saba vastu-nirūpaṇa

synonyms: ei caudda śloke—in these fourteen verses; kari—I make; maṅgala-ācaraṇa—auspicious invocation; taṅhi—therefore in that; madhye—within; kahi—I speak; saba—all; vastu—object; nirūpaṇa—description.
translation: These fourteen verses, therefore, offer auspicious invocations and describe the Supreme Truth.
